cd /home/sam/.claude/progressive-deploy && git add .planning/phases/12-ghcr-subscription/12-RESEARCH.md && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
docs(12): complete phase research - GHCR Subscription

Phase 12: GHCR Subscription
- Standard stack identified (Kargo ImageSubscription + SealedSecrets)
- Architecture patterns documented (dual-secret, namespace replication)
- Common pitfalls catalogued (PAT type, labels, namespaces)

CRITICAL FINDING: ghcr.io requires classic PAT (not fine-grained)
- read:packages scope for pull access
- Two separate secrets needed: Kargo credential + imagePullSecret

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
